short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows table of content at a fixed position for better navigation through wikipedia pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Better navigation through wiki pages by fixing table of content
- Highlight current section while scrolling main page
- Open source hence privacy respecting
- Supports all languages

Whenever user reach to the bottom of wiki page and want to navigate to the other section of wiki, the only way normally would be to go to the top and then click on the section. This is very cumbersome. This extension solves this exact problem by providing table of content all the time.
